speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Michael?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Michael. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit Card. To proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Michael. Can you also confirm your current address for me?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Elm Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You have an outstanding balance of $500. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment today online.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can assist you with that. Would you like to use the same bank account as before?

speaker: Agent
text: Okay, I’ll set that up. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Michael. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
